name: Jewel Murder Mystery - Special Enquiry on Adventure Escape
name_original: Jewel Murder Mystery - Special Enquiry on Adventure Escape
description:
GET THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECT GAME ON AppStore!
Can you find all the Hidden Objects?

Jewel Murder Mystery has been solving mysteries for years and you’ve just been recruited to join! Climb your way to the top as the greatest detective and help solve crimes throughout Europe! Find hidden objects in London at Jewel Palace!

GAME FEATURES:
-Complete hundreds of quests!
-Investigate and solve crimes!
-Hidden Object scenes change every time you play!
-Hundreds of items to find and collect!
-Continuous updates with new scenes and characters!
-Connect with other popular Hidden Object games.
-Get rewards by playing on Facebook!
-Obtain high scores and compete with your friends!
-No Internet connection required to play!
-FREE hidden object game!
-High resolution graphics!

VISIT US: http://www.skyblitzstudio.com
LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/SkyblitzStudio
FOLLOW US: https://twitter.com/SkyBlitz_Studio
